note: External SM/QED inputs for the secondary ᾱ^(5)(MZ) consistency check: alpha(0) → alpha(MZ) conversion via Δα(MZ)=Δα_lept+Δα_had^(5)+finite EW decoupling pieces. This is a comparison layer, not a TFPT prediction.

alpha_s_MZ.source: PDG 2024 electroweak review (used in Eq. 10.13 for the MSbar↔on-shell shift).

delta_alpha_msbar_on_shell_shift_MZ.source: PDG 2024 electroweak review Eq. (10.13): Δα̂(MZ) − Δα(MZ) = 0.007122(2)(5).
delta_alpha_msbar_on_shell_shift_MZ.note: Finite MSbar↔on-shell shift including W-loop and QCD terms; used explicitly as an EW decoupling piece.

delta_alpha_top_decoupling_MZ.source: α̂^(5)(MZ) is defined in the five-flavor scheme; top is decoupled by definition.
delta_alpha_top_decoupling_MZ.note: Set to 0 unless a six-flavor scheme is adopted explicitly.

delta_alpha_extra_msbar_MZ.source: Deprecated legacy field retained for backwards compatibility.

leptonic_vacuum_polarization_model.note: Sufficient for an assumption-explicit secondary check. For precision EW fits, include higher-order QED/EW corrections and scheme-specific definitions.
